#summary Contains commands syntax and default behaviour description

= Introduction =

You can send commands to jxmpp-bot using four methods:

  # Send text message using any IM application directly to bot (using bot's JID)
  # Send private message while you are in jabber conference room `*`
  # Send group-chat message while you are in jabber conference room `*`
  # Send xmpp message using your own software/tool
 Note: Bot must be in the same room as you are [[Introduction]]
